pages.text: They non possess knowledge hoc nor perfecit their parentes! Quod blasphemy advenit out de their mouths quod they utter est gross lie
Vos blame their response hoc narration their disbelieving in it vos saddened
Nos adorned everything terra in order test them sic distinguish those among them work righteousness
Inevitably nos wipe out everything it sinister it completely barren
Why alias vos think nos est perfecit telling vos people cave numerus connected cum them? They est noster wondrous signum
When youths took refuge cave they dictus Noster Dominus shower nos Tuus mercy beatus noster affairs Tuus guidance
Nos tunc sigillum their ears cave pro predetermined numerus annus
Tunc nos resurrected them vide quae de 2 parties comes duration their stay therein
Nos narrate vos their history truthfully. They est youths believed in their Dominus nos increased their guidance
Nos strengthened their hearts when they stood proclaimed Noster unus Dominus est Dominus de caelum terra! Nos nunquam worship any alius deus Eum. Alias nos est far astray
Hic est noster people setting deus Eum! Unus they provisus any proof support their stand Qui malus than unus fabricates lies est attributes them DEUS
